column3:
I'm done dealing with your incompetence.
Your final paycheck has been revoked due to theft from the register. Security footage doesn't lie.
Don't bother using me as a reference. I'll make sure every employer in this city knows about you.
Good luck affording rent and all those subscriptions now.
"What's up brother!\nTry our exclusive game and make MEGA MONEY! Real players are winning thousands daily!\nRules: Since our game offers a great opportunity
column4: we only allow players to have 3 turns per day to win BIG!\nYour lucky break is just one click away

Your account has been overdrawn and is now TERMINATED. Multiple insufficient fund incidents have violated our terms of service.
All remaining assets have been seized to cover fees. This includes your security deposit and any pending transfers.
Your credit score is destroyed. You're financially dead to us."
